DOC.brief_summary: Aim: to examine caries occurrence in children who ten years ago received a mixture of probiotics during infancy. Hypothesis: the administration of probiotics during infancy has no effect on future dental health.
DOC.brief_title: Does Administration of Probiotics During Infancy Increase the Caries Risk of a Child
DOC.criteria: Child participated in the probiotic milk intervention study in early 2000 Child lives now within 100 km from Turku Child has a chronic illness affecting dental health Child lives now outside 100 km from Turku
